bibl.title: The Prefecture of Caecilius Consultius.
Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists

bibl.note: P. Stras. 560, the only papyrus recording the tenure of Caecilius [Cons]ultius as praefectus Aegypti, should be dated to 28 September / 27 October 326 CE. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Caillan Davenport, The Prefecture of Caecilius Consultius.
P. Stras. 560, the only papyrus recording the tenure of Caecilius [Cons]ultius as praefectus Aegypti, should be dated to 28 September / 27 October 326 CE. - Avec résumé en anglais.
